Question:
ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻa e voltage ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai ʻi ha inductor ko e,
A.ola ʻo hono inductance mo e lolotonga ʻ i aí.
B.fika ʻo hono inductance ke lolotonga ʻi ai.
C.fika ʻo e lolotonga ʻo aʻu ki hono inductance.
D.ola ʻo hono inductance mo e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga.
GivenAnswer:

D. ola ʻo hono inductance mo e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga.

\[ V = L \frac{dI}{dt} \]

ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻeni ko e voltage (V) ʻoku tatau ia mo e inductance (L) ʻo e inductor mo e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga (\(\frac{dI}{dt}\)).

Question:
Naʻe hiki ʻe ha tokotaha fakapolokalama ʻa e polokalama ʻi lalo. ʻOku fakaʻaongaʻi ʻe he polokalama ha lisi ʻo e ngaahi mataʻifika ʻoku ui ko e numList. ʻOku fakataumuʻa ʻa e polokalama ke fakaʻaliʻali ʻa e fakakatoa ʻo e ngaahi mataʻifika ʻi he lisi.
 fakakatoa ← numList [1]
 KI he tuʻunga ʻulungaanga mahuʻinga takitaha ʻi he numList
 fakakatoa ʻo e paʻanga ← + mahuʻinga
 FAKAʻALIʻALI ʻa e fakakatoa
 Koeʻuhi ke lava ʻo siviʻi ʻa e polokalama, ʻoku initializes ʻe he tokotaha fakapolokalama ʻa e numList ki he [0, 1, 4, 5]. ʻOku fakaʻaliʻali ʻe he polokalama ʻa e 10, pea ʻoku fakaʻosi ʻe he tokotaha fakapolokalama ʻoku ngaue ʻa e polokalama ʻo hange ko e taumuʻa. Ko e fē ʻi he ngaahi meʻá ni ʻoku moʻoní?
A.ʻOku tonu ʻa e aofangatuku; ʻoku ngaue ʻa e polokalama ʻo hange ko e taumuʻa.
B.ʻOku hala ʻa e aofangatuku; ʻOku ʻikai fakaʻaliʻali ʻe he polokalama ʻa e mahuʻinga totonu ki he sivi [0, 1, 4, 5].
C.ʻOku hala ʻa e aofangatuku; ʻOku ʻikai feʻunga hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e sivi [0, 1, 4, 5] ke fakaʻosi ʻaki ʻoku tonu ʻa e polokalama.
D.ʻOku hala ʻa e aofangatuku; fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e sivi [0, 1, 4, 5] ʻoku ne fakapapauʻi pe ʻoku ngaue ʻa e polokalama ki he ngaahi lisi ʻi he fakautuutu ʻo e maau.
GivenAnswer:

Ko e polokalama ʻoku fakahā ʻe ia ʻa e fakakatoa ʻo e ngaahi mataʻifika ʻi he lisi numList. Ka neongo ia, ʻoku ʻikai ke ne fakahā ʻa e mahuʻinga totonu ʻi he sivi [0, 1, 4, 5]. ʻOku ʻikai ke ne fakahā ʻa e mahuʻinga totonu ʻo e fakakatoa ʻo e ngaahi mataʻifika ʻi he lisi. ʻOku totonu ke fakakatoa ʻa e ngaahi mahuʻinga kotoa pe ʻi he lisi, ka ʻoku ʻikai ke fakahā ʻe he polokalama ʻa e fakakatoa totonu.

Question:
Ko e 0.1 ʻa e lavameʻa ʻa ha photon MONOKISAITI. Kapau ʻoku ʻave ʻa e photons ʻe 100 ki he MONOKISAITI, ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻe he MONOKISAITI ʻa e photons
A.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 4

D.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni ko e:

A. ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 4

Ko e fakamatala ki he tali ko ʻeni ko e:

- Ko e lavameʻa ʻo e MONOKISAITI ko e 0.1, ʻo ʻuhinga ʻoku ne ʻiloʻi ʻa e photons ʻe 10 mei he photons ʻe 100 (0.1 * 100 = 10).
- Ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10 ko e ʻuhinga ʻoku ʻiloʻi ʻe he MONOKISAITI ʻa e photons ʻe 10 mei he photons ʻe 100.
- Ko e rms (root mean square) ʻo e taʻu ko e fakaʻilonga ʻo e variability pe standard deviation ʻo e ngaahi photons ʻoku ʻiloʻi ʻe he MONOKISAITI. ʻI he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni, ko e standard deviation ʻo e binomial distribution (ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e lavameʻa p = 0.1 mo e n = 100) ko e sqrt(np(1-p)) = sqrt(100 * 0.1 * 0.9) = sqrt(9) = 3.

Ko ia, ko e tali totonu ko e A.

Question:

Question:
ʻOku ʻi ai ha tangike ʻi he fotunga ʻo ha prism tapatolu. Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ha feituʻu ʻoku fute ʻe 116 ʻa e fakavaʻe tapatolu, pea ʻoku fute ʻe 30 hono maʻolunga ʻo e tangike, ko e ha hono lahi ʻo e vai ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tangike ʻi he taimi ʻoku fonu ai?
A.1725 FT ^ 3
B.1740 FT ^ 3
C.3480 FT ^ 3
D.6960 FT ^ 3
GivenAnswer:
Ke fakakaukauʻi ʻa e lahi ʻo e vai ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tangike ʻi he taimi ʻoku fonu ai, ʻoku totonu ke tau ʻiloʻi ʻa e voliume ʻo e tangike. Ko e tangike ʻoku ʻi he fotunga ʻo ha prism tapatolu, pea ko e voliume ʻo ha prism tapatolu ʻoku fakakaukauʻi ʻaki ʻa e foomula ko ʻeni:

\[ \text{Voliume} = \text{Fakavaʻe} \times \text{Maʻolunga} \]

ʻOku ʻi ai ha fakavaʻe tapatolu ʻoku fute ʻe 116, pea ʻoku fute ʻe 30 hono maʻolunga ʻo e tangike. Ko ia, ʻoku tau lava ʻo fakakaukauʻi ʻa e voliume ʻo e tangike ʻaki ʻa e foomula ko ʻeni:

\[ \text{Voliume} = 116 \, \text{ft}^2 \times 30 \, \text{ft} \]

Fakakaukauʻi ʻa e voliume:

\[ \text{Voliume} = 3480 \, \text{ft}^3 \]

Ko ia, ko e voliume ʻo e vai ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tangike ʻi he taimi ʻoku fonu ai ko e:

C. 3480 FT ^ 3

Question:

GivenAnswer:

Ko e meʻa naʻe hoko ki he vai "mole" ʻi he Mars ko e maumauʻi ia ki fakapaaki ʻo e mo e ʻokisikena ʻe ultraviolet mama pea naʻe mole ʻa e fakapaaki ʻo e ʻi he hola. ʻI he taimi naʻe mole ai ʻa e malaʻe hiki fakamakinito ʻo Mars, naʻe ʻikai lava ʻo maluʻi ʻa e ʻatamosifia mei he ngaahi matangi ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻu. Question:

GivenAnswer:

Question:

ʻUluaki, kuo pau ke tau pehe ʻoku spherical ʻa e cosmos, koeʻuhi he ko e foomu ko ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai fie maʻu ki ai ha hokotanga hui, ko e kakato taha ia, koeʻuhi he ʻoku ne ʻai ʻa e foomu capacious taha, ʻa ia ʻoku feʻunga lelei taha ke ʻi ai mo fakatolonga ʻa e meʻa kotoa pe; pe koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi konga kotoa ʻo e ʻunivesi, ʻa ia ko e laʻaa, mahina mo e ngaahi palanite ʻoku ʻasi ʻi he founga ko ʻeni; pe koeʻuhi ʻoku feinga ʻa e meʻa kotoa pe ke maʻu ʻa e foomu ko ʻeni, ʻo hange ko ia ʻoku ha ʻi he tuluta ʻo e vai mo e ngaahi sino kehe ʻo kapau te nau feinga ke fakaʻuhingaʻi kinautolu. Ko ia heʻikai ha taha ʻ e veiveiua ko e faʻahinga ko ení ʻ oku ʻ a e ngaahi sino fakahēvaní ia. ...
ʻOku ʻikai toe fehuʻia ʻa e mamani, koeʻuhi he ʻoku ʻi he tafaʻaki kotoa pe ʻi hono senitaa. Neongo ko e ʻ uhinga ʻ o e ngaahi sanitungua ʻ o e ngaahi moʻungá mo e ngaahi loto - mafasia ʻ o e ngaahi teleʻá ʻ oku ʻ ikai lava ke mahinoʻi ai ha siakale haohaoa, ka ʻ oku ʻ ikai uesia ʻ e he meʻá ni ʻ a e natula fakalūkufua ʻ o e māmaní. ...

Question:

GivenAnswer:
To solve the expression \(-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot \cfrac{1}{~ \frac{1}{-3} ~}\), we need to simplify each part step by step.

First, simplify \(-\dfrac{1}{-3}\):
\[
-\dfrac{1}{-3} = \dfrac{1}{3}
\]

Next, simplify \(\cfrac{1}{~ \frac{1}{-3} ~}\):
\[
\frac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} = -3
\]

Now, we multiply the simplified parts together:
\[
\dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) = \dfrac{1 \cdot (-3)}{3} = \dfrac{-3}{3} = -1
\]

Therefore, the value of the expression is \(-1\).

The correct answer is:
B. -1

ʻI ha kulupu, ko e tuʻunga ko ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai ke moʻoni. ʻI ha kulupu, ko e (ab)^{-1} = b^{-1}a^{-1}, pea ʻi he tuʻunga ko ʻeni, (ab)^{-2} = ((ab)^{-1})^{-1} = (b^{-1}a^{-1})^{-1} = a^{-1}b^{-1}. Ko ia, ʻoku hala ʻa e fakamatala 1.

**Fakamatala 2: (ab)^n = a^n b^n**

ʻI ha kulupu, ko e tuʻunga ko ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai ke moʻoni. ʻI he ngaahi kulupu fakalukufua, ʻoku ʻikai ke tau lava ʻo fakamālohiʻi ʻa e (ab)^n ke tatau mo e a^n b^n. ʻOku totonu ke tau vakaiʻi ʻa e ngaahi tuʻunga kehekehe ʻo e ngaahi kulupu ke fakapapauʻi ʻa e tuʻunga ko ʻeni, ka ʻi he ngaahi kulupu fakalukufua, ʻoku ʻikai ke moʻoni ʻa e fakamatala ko ʻeni.

Ko ia, ko e tali totonu ko e:
B. Hala, Hala

Question:
Kumi ʻa e loloa ʻo e Pikoʻanga y = laine x ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi poini ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e y = 1/2 mo e y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Ke fakakaukauʻi ʻa e loloa ʻo e pikoʻanga y = laine x ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi poini ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e y = 1/2 mo e y = 1, ʻoku totonu ke tau ngaueʻaki ʻa e calculus, tautefito ki he ngaahi meʻa hange ko e ngaahi pikoʻanga mo e ngaahi loloa.

ʻI he konga ko ʻeni, ʻoku tau fie maʻu ke tau integrate ʻa e function y = x mei he y = 1/2 ki he y = 1. Ko e loloa ʻo e pikoʻanga ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi poini ko ʻeni ʻoku lava ke fakamatalaʻi ʻaki ʻa e formula ko ʻeni:

\[ L = \int_{a}^{b} \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{dx}{dy}\right)^2} \, dy \]

ʻI he konga ko ʻeni, ko e function ko ia y = x, ko ia ko e x = y. Ko ia, ko e \(\frac{dx}{dy} = 1\).

Ko ia, ko e formula ko ia:

\[ L = \int_{1/2}^{1} \sqrt{1 + 1^2} \, dy \]
\[ L = \int_{1/2}^{1} \sqrt{2} \, dy \]
\[ L = \sqrt{2} \int_{1/2}^{1} \, dy \]
\[ L = \sqrt{2} [y]_{1/2}^{1} \]
\[ L = \sqrt{2} (1 - 1/2) \]
\[ L = \sqrt{2} \cdot \frac{1}{2} \]
\[ L = \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} \]

Ko e \(\sqrt{2}\) ko e 1.414, pea ko e \(\frac{1.414}{2}\) ko e 0.707.

Ko ia, ko e loloa ʻo e pikoʻanga y = x ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e y = 1/2 mo e y = 1 ko e 0.707. ʻOku ʻikai ha fili totonu ʻi he ngaahi fili ʻoku tuʻu mai, ka ʻoku ofi taha ʻa e 0.707 ki he 0.86.

Ko ia, ko e tali totonu taha ko e:
B. 0.86

Question:
Fakapapauʻi ʻa e H + (aq) ʻi he 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, founga fakaleleiʻi. (Ko e ka ki he phenol ko e 1 × 10 ^-10.)
A.1 × 10 ^-10 M
B.1 × 10 ^-9 M
C.1 × 10 ^-3 M
D.1 × 10 ^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Ke fakapapauʻi ʻa e concentration ʻo e H⁺ (aq) ʻi he 1.0 M phenol (C₆H₅OH), ʻoku totonu ke tau fakatokangaʻi ʻa e Ka ʻo e phenol. ʻOku ʻomi ʻe he fehuʻi ʻa e Ka ʻo e phenol ko e 1 × 10⁻¹⁰.

ʻOku tau lava ʻo fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e Ka ke fakakaukauʻi ʻa e concentration ʻo e H⁺ (aq) ʻi he vai. Ko e Ka ko e equilibrium constant ki he ionization ʻo e phenol ʻi he vai, pea ʻoku fakamatalaʻi ʻeni ʻe he equation ko ʻeni:

\[ \text{Ka} = \frac{[H^+][C_6H_5O^-]}{[C_6H_5OH]} \]

ʻI he taimi ʻoku tau kamata ai mo e 1.0 M phenol, pea ʻoku tau assume ʻoku siʻisiʻi ʻa e ionization, pea ʻe toe pe ʻa e concentration ʻo e phenol ʻi he solution ko e 1.0 M. Ko e concentration ʻo e H⁺ mo e C₆H₅O⁻ ʻe tatau, pea tau fakaʻilongaʻi ia ko e x.

Ko ia, ʻe hoko ʻa e equation ko ʻeni:

\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = \frac{[x][x]}{1.0} \]

\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = x^2 \]

Ke maʻu ʻa e x, tau liliu ʻa e equation:

\[ x = \sqrt{1 \times 10^{-10}} \]

\[ x = 1 \times 10^{-5} \]

Ko ia, ko e concentration ʻo e H⁺ (aq) ʻi he 1.0 M phenol ko e 1 × 10⁻⁵ M.

Ko e tali totonu ko e:

D. 1 × 10 ^-5 M

Question:
ʻOku fakahoko nai ʻa e homicide taʻefakalao ʻe he faifekau ʻo e fonua X ʻi ha ngaue jure imperii pe jure gestionis?
A.Ko e faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ko ha ngaue ia ʻa e kakai (jure imperii)

D.Ko e faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ko ha ngaue ia ʻa e kakai ka ʻoku maluʻi ia ʻe he ngaahi hao
GivenAnswer:
C. Ko e faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ko ha ngaue fakafoʻituitui (jure gestionis)

ʻI he ngaahi tuʻunga ʻo e lao fakavahaʻapuleʻanga, ʻoku ʻi ai ha vahevahe ʻi he ngaahi ngaue ʻa e fonua ʻi he ngaahi tuʻunga kehekehe ʻo e jure imperii mo e jure gestionis. ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e jure imperii ki he ngaahi ngaue ʻa e fonua ʻoku fakahoko ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e mafai fakapuleʻanga, ʻo hange ko e ngaahi ngaue fakaʻatamai pe ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni fakapuleʻanga. ʻI he tafaʻaki ʻe taha, ʻoku ʻuhinga ʻa e jure gestionis ki he ngaahi ngaue fakafoʻituitui pe ngaahi ngaue ʻoku ʻikai ke nau ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e mafai fakapuleʻanga, hange ko e ngaahi ngaue fakapaʻanga pe ngaahi ngaue fakaʻatamai ʻoku ʻikai ke nau ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e mafai fakapuleʻanga.

ʻI he tuʻunga ko ʻeni, kapau ʻoku fakahoko ʻe he faifekau ʻo e fonua X ha homicide taʻefakalao, ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e mafai fakapuleʻanga (jure imperii) ka ʻoku ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e ngaue fakafoʻituitui (jure gestionis). Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonu ko e:

C. Ko e faʻahinga ʻulungaanga pehee ko ha ngaue fakafoʻituitui (jure gestionis)

Question:
Ko e fononga ʻi he ʻuluaki vave ʻo e 1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s, ʻoku hu ha proton ki ha feituʻu ʻo e hiki fakamakinito ʻo e lahi ʻo e 1.5 T. Kapau ʻoku hanga ʻe he ʻuluaki malohi vector ʻa e proton ʻo ʻai ha tuliki ʻe 30 ° mo e feituʻu hiki fakamakinito, compute e vave ʻo e proton 4 s hili ʻene hu ki he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito.
A.5.0 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
ʻI he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito, ʻoku ʻikai liliu ʻa e vave ʻo e proton, ka ʻoku liliu pē hono tuʻunga. Ko e vave ʻo e proton ʻi ha feituʻu hiki fakamakinito ʻoku fakafalala ki he vave ʻuluaki pea mo e tuliki ʻoku ne hu ai ki he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito.

ʻI he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito, ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngaahi konga ʻe ua ʻo e vave:
1. Ko e konga longitudinal (v_parallel) ʻoku fakahā ʻi he tuʻunga tatau mo e feituʻu hiki fakamakinito.
2. Ko e konga transverse (v_perpendicular) ʻoku fakahā ʻi he tuʻunga kehekehe mo e feituʻu hiki fakamakinito.

ʻOku ʻikai liliu ʻa e konga longitudinal ʻo e vave ʻo e proton ʻi he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito, pea ʻoku ʻikai liliu foki ʻa e konga transverse ʻo e vave, ka ʻoku ne fakatupu ha neesi circular.

Ko e vave ʻuluaki ʻo e proton ko e 1.5 × 10^6 m/s pea ʻoku ne hu ki he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito ʻi ha tuliki ʻo e 30°.

Ko e konga longitudinal ʻo e vave (v_parallel):
\[ v_{\parallel} = v \cos(\theta) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \cos(30°) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \times \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} = 1.5 \times 10^6 \times 0.866 = 1.299 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \]

Ko e konga transverse ʻo e vave (v_perpendicular):
\[ v_{\perp} = v \sin(\theta) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \sin(30°) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \times \frac{1}{2} = 1.5 \times 10^6 \times 0.5 = 0.75 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \]

ʻI he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito, ʻoku ʻikai liliu ʻa e vave ʻo e proton, ka ʻoku liliu pē hono tuʻunga. Ko ia, hili ʻa e 4 s, ʻe kei tatau pē ʻa e vave ʻo e proton mo hono vave ʻuluaki.

Ko e vave ʻo e proton hili ʻa e 4 s:
\[ v = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \]

Ko ia, ko e tali ko e:
C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s

Naʻe fai leva ʻe he loea ʻa e koloa ki he kasitoma ʻa e fehuʻi ko ʻeni: "Kapau naʻe ʻikai ke ke sio ki he fononga ʻa e fefine ʻi he kane, ʻoku ke ʻilo fefe naʻa ne to koeʻuhi ko ia?" GivenAnswer:

Question:

GivenAnswer:

ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻeni ko e taimi naʻe hoko ai ʻa e meʻa fakaʻohovale, naʻe ʻikai ke lava ʻa e fakaʻiloa ʻo ngaue ʻi ha founga ʻoku totonu pe fakatatau ki he ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻo e lao koeʻuhi ko e fuʻu ʻohovale lahi. ʻOku fakahaaʻi ʻe he fakamoʻoni taukei ʻoku ʻikai ko ha meʻa foʻou ʻa e ngaahi toʻonga peheé ʻi he taimi ʻoku hoko ai ha meʻa fakaʻohovale moʻoni, pea ʻoku fakamoʻoni ʻa e fakaʻiloa naʻe ʻikai ke ne lava ʻo ngaue ʻi he taimi naʻe hoko ai ʻa e meʻa fakaʻohovale. Question:
ʻOku ʻilo ʻe ha tokotaha ngaue ʻi he kautaha ngaohiʻanga koloa lahi ʻa e ngaue ʻoku taʻeoli, pea ne fua pe ʻa e ngaue ki he paʻanga. ʻOku minimally ʻa e tokotaha ngaue, pea ʻoku ʻikai fakaʻaiʻai ia ke ne ʻomi ha tuʻunga maʻolunga taha pe lelei ange. A.fai ha totongi mo ha fakaʻaiʻai ki ha ola lahi ange
B.toe fokotuʻutuʻu foʻou ʻa e ngaue ke ʻomi ha faingataʻa mo ha ongoʻi lavameʻa

GivenAnswer:
Fakatatau ki he fakakaukau ʻa F. Herzberg, ko e founga lelei taha ʻe 10 ʻe fakatupulaki ai e fakaʻaiʻai ʻa e tokotaha ngaue ko ʻeni ke:

B. toe fokotuʻutuʻu foʻou ʻa e ngaue ke ʻomi ha faingataʻa mo ha ongoʻi lavameʻa

ʻOku ʻiloa ʻa e fakakaukau ʻa Herzberg ko e "Two-Factor Theory" pe "Motivation-Hygiene Theory," ʻoku ne fakamatalaʻi ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngaahi meʻa ʻe ua ʻoku ne uesia ʻa e fakaʻaiʻai ʻa e tokotaha ngaue: ko e ngaahi meʻa fakaʻaiʻai (motivators) mo e ngaahi meʻa fakaʻata (hygiene factors). ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakaʻaiʻai ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ne fakatupulaki ʻa e fakaʻamu mo e lavameʻa ʻi he ngaue, hange ko e ongoʻi lavameʻa, ngaahi faingamalie ke ako mo e tupulaki, mo e ngāue ʻoku ne ʻomi ha ongoʻi mahuʻinga. ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakaʻata ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ne fakatupu ʻa e taʻeoli kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke nau lelei, hange ko e totongi, tuʻunga lelei ʻo e ngāue, mo e vaʻinga lelei mo e puleʻanga.

ʻI he keisi ko ʻeni, ko e toe fokotuʻutuʻu foʻou ʻa e ngaue ke ʻomi ha faingataʻa mo ha ongoʻi lavameʻa ʻe lava ke ne fakatupulaki ʻa e fakaʻaiʻai ʻa e tokotaha ngaue ʻi he founga ʻo e ngaahi meʻa fakaʻaiʻai ʻa Herzberg.

Question:
Ko e tokotaha ʻoku ne tohi ʻi he tohi ko ha tokotaha Mekisikou-ʻAmelika pea ʻoku ne fakakaukau ʻoku ne fie maʻu ha tokolahi ʻo e kau fili ʻo Mekisikou kae lava ke ne maʻu ʻa e fili. Ko hono ola, ko ʻene pule ngaue, ʻoku ne fakakaukau ke meili ki he fili kotoa pe ʻo Mekisikou ha fakaʻilonga, ʻa ia ʻoku ne ui ʻa e hingoa mo e ʻofisi ʻo e tokotaha ʻoku teu papi ʻa ia ʻoku ne lele ki ai. Koeʻuhi ʻoku tokolahi ha kakai tuʻufonua ʻo Mekisikou ʻoku ʻikai ke nau poto ʻi hono lau mo tohi e lea faka-Pilitania, ʻoku tui ʻa e pule ngaue ʻe faingataʻaʻia ha tokolahi ʻo e kau fili ʻi hono hiki e hingoa mo e ʻofisi ʻo e tokotaha ʻoku teu papi ʻi he hikinima.
